rules.text:
If at any time the Robot operation or team actions are deemed unsafe or have damaged the Field Elements or Scoring Objects, by the determination of the referees, the offending team may be Disabled and/or Disqualified. The Robot will require re-inspection before it may again take the field. 
	 a. Teams should be extra cautious when interacting with Scoring Objects. Damage such as large scuffs and/or punctures can be ruled as a violation of <S1>.

If a Robot goes completely out-of-bounds (outside the playing field), it will be Disabled for the remainder of the Match. Note: The intent is NOT to penalize Robots for having mechanisms that inadvertently cross the field border during normal game play.
